name: Sulu
wishText: This is our present from us, relax from the uni stress you got
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what we were going to do.
text4: We realised, we wanted to do something
outroText: IT IS YOUR BIRTHDAY WE GO PARTY IT IS YOUR BIRTHDAY
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
